        Opens the first page of this paged inventory
        Parameters:
        player - The player opening the paged inventory
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • open

        boolean open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
             int index)
        Opens the page at the given index of this paged inventory, index starts at 0
        Parameters:
        player - The player opening the inventory
        index - The index of the inventory to be opened
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

                 org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory currentlyOpen)
        Opens the next inventory of this paged inventory
        Parameters:
        player - The player opening the inventory
        currentlyOpen - The inventory currently open
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

        Determine if this paged inventory contains the given inventory
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to check for
        Returns:

        Get the index of the specified page
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to get the index of
        Returns:

      • addPage

        void addPage(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> contents,
             java.lang.String title,
             int size)
        Add a new inventory to the end of this paged inventory
        Parameters:
        contents - The content to add to the inventory. The key is the slot and the value is the item stack
        title - The title for the inventory
        size - The size of the inventory

      • removePage

        boolean removePage(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
        Remove an inventory from this paged inventory
        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to remove
        Returns:
        true if the inventory was successfully removed, false otherwise

      • removePage

        org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory removePage(int index)
        Remove the page at the given index of this paged inventory, index starts at 0
        Parameters:
        index - The index at which the inventory you want to remove is located
        Returns:
        The inventory removed

      • getNavigation

        @Deprecated
java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,NavigationItem> getNavigation()
        Deprecated. use getNavigationRow()
        Get the navigation buttons of this paged inventory
        Returns:
        A Map of the navigation where the key is the NavigationType and the value is the item stack representing the button

      • getNavigationRow

        NavigationRow getNavigationRow()
        Get the navigation row
        Returns:
        The navigation row

      • getNavigationItem

        NavigationItem getNavigationItem(int slot)
        Get the navigation item at the specified slot
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot with the navigation item. Use a slot from 0 to 8
        Returns:
        The NavigationItem at the specified slot in the navigation row

      • getNavigationItem

        int getNavigationItem(NavigationItem navigationItem)
        Get the slot of the specified navigation item
        Parameters:
        navigationItem - The NavigationItem to get the slot of
        Returns:
        The slot, from 0 to 8, in the navigation row, or -1 if it wasn't found

      • setNavigation

        @Deprecated
void setNavigation(java.lang.Integer slot,
                                NavigationItem navigationItem)
        Deprecated. use getNavigationRow() and NavigationRow.set(int, NavigationItem)
        Update a navigation button of this paged inventory
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot in the bottom bar of the page (0-8)
        navigationItem - The item to replace the item in the specified slot

        int getSize()
        Get how many inventory pages there are
        Returns:
        How many inventory pages there are
